title: Replacing Selfishness & Control
itunes:author: Guests: Bill & Pam Farrel
itunes:summary:
If we're honest, we all struggle with selfishness in marriage. However, a good dose of gratitude can be the best solution for selfishness. John and Greg share how being thankful can greatly benefit your marriage. Featuring Bill and Pam Farrel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive Bill and Pam Farrel's book "The First Five Years: Make the Love Investment That Lasts a Lifetime " for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1416601

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/replacing-selfishness-control/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/thriving-in-the-early-years-of-marriage-digital-product?refcd=1416601

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
